fileDescription: Strings for Map.ly Lite Construct 3 plugin.

lysdenart_maplyliteplugin.name: Map.ly lite
lysdenart_maplyliteplugin.description: A plugin that integrate leaflet.js to display maps into Construct 3.

initiallyVisible.name: Initially visible
initiallyVisible.desc: Choose whether the object is visible when the layout starts.

canvaPosition.name: Map in front of the canvas ?
canvaPosition.desc: Choose whether the object is in front or behind the canvas element.

mapDescription.name: Customize text on the object
mapDescription.desc: Customize text on the object. Only have an effect editor side.

tileLayer.name: Link
tileLayer.desc: URL of the tile layer. See https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/ for map providers.

providers.name: Map providers
providers.desc: Click to navigate to a map providers page

minZoom.name: Min Zoom
minZoom.desc: Minimum zoom level of the map.

maxZoom.name: Max Zoom
maxZoom.desc: Maximum zoom level of the map.

showAttribution.name: Show Attribution
showAttribution.desc: Display attribution data in a small text box on a map.

showZoomControl.name: Show Zoom Control
showZoomControl.desc: Display a basic zoom control with two buttons (zoom in and zoom out).

showScaleControl.name: Show Scale Control
showScaleControl.desc: Display a simple scale control that shows the scale of the current center of screen in metric (m/km) systems.

closePopupOnClick.name: close Popup On Click
closePopupOnClick.desc: popups to close when user clicks the map.

doubleClickZoom.name: Double Click Zoom
doubleClickZoom.desc: Whether the map can be zoomed in by double clicking on it

dragging.name: Dragging
dragging.desc: Whether the map be draggable with mouse/touch or not.

enablingZoom.name: Enable zoom
enablingZoom.desc: Permit zoom with touch r mouse roll

graticule_showGraticule.name: show graticule
graticule_showGraticule.desc: show a graticule on the map.

graticule_showLabel.name: show Label
graticule_showLabel.desc: Show the grid tick label at the edges of the map.

graticule_weight.name: weight
graticule_weight.desc: The width of the graticule lines

graticule_color.name: color
graticule_color.desc: The color of the graticule lines.

graticule_zoomInterval.name: zoom Interval
graticule_zoomInterval.desc: Use different intervals in different zoom levels. See : https://github.com/Leaflet/Leaflet.Graticule#options

groupLincence.name: Map.ly licensing
groupLincence.desc: If you don't have a license, you can get one here : https://lysden.gumroad.com/l/eggqe

license_key.name: Your license key
license_key.desc: Enter your license here. If you don't have one: please go here : https://lysden.gumroad.com/l/eggqe

on-resize.description: Fired when the map is resized.

on-unload.description: Fired when the map is destroyed with remove method.

on-view-reset.description: Fired when the map needs to redraw its content (this usually happens on map zoom or load). Very useful for creating custom overlays.

on-load.description: Fired when the map is initialized (when its center and zoom are set for the first time).

on-zoom-start.description: Fired when the map zoom is about to change (e.g. before zoom animation).

on-move-start.description: Fired when the view of the map starts changing (e.g. user starts dragging the map).

on-zoom.description: Fired repeatedly during any change in zoom level, including zoom and fly animations.

on-move.description: Fired repeatedly during any movement of the map, including pan and fly animations.

on-zoom-end.description: Fired when the map has changed, after any animations.

on-move-end.description: Fired when the center of the map stops changing (e.g. user stopped dragging the map).

on-click.description: Fired when the user clicks (or taps) the map.

on-dbl-click.description: Fired when the user double-clicks (or double-taps) the map.

on-mouse-down.description: Fired when the user pushes the mouse button on the map.

on-mouse-up.description: Fired when the user releases the mouse button on the map.

on-mouse-over.description: Fired when the mouse enters the map.

on-mouse-out.description: Fired when the mouse leaves the map.

on-mouse-move.description: Fired while the mouse moves over the map.

on-context-menu.description: Fired when the user pushes the right mouse button on the map, prevents default browser context menu from showing if there are listeners on this event. Also fired on mobile when the user holds a single touch for a second (also called long press).

on-key-press.description: Fired when the user presses a key from the keyboard while the map is focused.

on-get-distance.description: Fired when distance with id is ready

on-get-clicked-coords.description: Fired when last clicked point on map with id {0} is ready

is-flipped.description: True is the map is flipped

is-mirrored.description: True is the map is mirrored

is-behind-canvas.description: True is the map behind the canvas rendering C3

set-attribution-visible.description: Display attribution data in a small text box on a map.

set-visible.name: Visibility
set-visible.desc: Choose whethever the attribution is hidden or shown.

set-graticule-visible.name: Visibility
set-graticule-visible.desc: Choose whethever the graticule is hidden or shown.

set-visible.name: Visibility
set-visible.desc: Choose whethever the map is hidden or shown.

set-zoom-control-visible.description: Display a basic zoom control with two buttons (zoom in and zoom out).

set-visible.name: Visibility
set-visible.desc: Choose whethever the zoom control is hidden or shown.

set-control-scale-visible.description: Display a simple scale control that shows the scale of the current center of screen in metric (m/km) and imperial (mi/ft) systems.

set-visible.name: Visibility
set-visible.desc: Choose whethever the scale control is hidden or shown.

change-base-tile-layer.display-text: Set [b]Base Tile Layer[/b] to [b]{0}[/b] with attribtion {1}
change-base-tile-layer.description: Choose the basic tile layer with its name.

compute-distance.display-text: compute distance between {0} and {1} with signal {2}

fly-to.display-text: Fly to coordinate [{0},{1}] with zoom {2} in {3}s

set-flip.description: Set the map verticaly flipped or back to normal

flip.name: Flipped ?
flip.desc: Choose whetther the map is verticaly flipped or set it back to normal

set-mirror.description: Set the map verticaly mirrored or back to normal

mirror.name: Mirrored ?
mirror.desc: Choose whetther the map is verticaly mirrored or set it back to normal

get-zoom.description: Returns the current zoom level of the map view.

get-center-lat.description: Returns the geographical center of the map view (latitude).

get-center-lng.description: Returns the geographical center of the map view (longitude).

get-min-zoom.description: Returns the minimum zoom level of the map (if set in the minZoom option of the map or of any layers), or 0 by default.

get-max-zoom.description: Returns the maximum zoom level of the map (if set in the maxZoom option of the map or of any layers).

get-distance.description: Returns the distance between two geographical coordinates.
